message.body: Hi, I'm doing well - watching our new kitten meet our old cat. How bout you?
Aww, thats so cute :) just taking a break from work, gonna grab lunch soon. What kind of cats are they?
The new guy is all black and our older one is all white with a few black markings - both strays we rescued
Thats awesome. Good on you :) how are they handling each other?
There's been some hissing but it should be all good soon. Our cat is a year and a half and this new guy is all of 11wks
Thats adorable. I wish i could have a cat but im allergic :/
My mum has a dog but ive developed an allergy for her too :/ its tragic really. Do you have any other pets?
Nope just these two cats. They're enough as it is
Gotcha. yea, I would imagine theyd be a handful.
